moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Your reset password has been set to: ${resetPassword}
Please use this reset password to change your password immediately.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 请立即使用这个重置密码设置你的账户密码。

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Your current password is still valid, this reset password may only be used to change your password.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 当前的账户密码依旧有效，重置密码只是用来修改你的账户密码。

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Your password must be changed before login.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 请重新设置密码后再登录系统。
